ri-oer.name: Rhode Island Office of Energy Resources

ri-dhs.name: Rhode Island Department of Human Services

incentives.program: RI Department of Human Services Weatherization Assistance Program
incentives.short_description: Weatherization Assistance Program reduces energy costs for households that meet LIHEAP criteria. If you qualify, there's no cost to you.

incentives.program: RI Office of Energy Resources Clean Heat RI Income-Eligible Incentive
incentives.short_description: Depending on your income, 100% of the cost to install an air source heat pump, including up to $3,000 towards related electric service upgrades.

incentives.program: RI Office of Energy Resources Clean Heat RI Income-Eligible Incentive
incentives.short_description: Depending on your income, 100% of the cost to install a heat pump water heater, including up to $3,000 towards related electric service upgrades.

incentives.program: Erika Niedowski Memorial Electric Bicycle Rebate Program
incentives.short_description: 75% up to $750 back on the final purchase of an e-bike or e-cargo bike for income qualified residents.

incentives.program: PowerUpRI
incentives.short_description: Rebate of 75% of cost for a Level 2 EV charger, up to $500, or up to $1,000 where an electrical upgrade is needed.

incentives.program: PowerUpRI
incentives.short_description: Rebate of 50% of cost for a Level 2 EV charger, up to $350, or up to $700 if an electrical upgrade is needed.

incentives.program: RI Office of Energy Resources Clean Heat RI
incentives.short_description: Up to $10,000 to install a ground source (geothermal) heat pump, depending on size. Typical heat pump installations will receive $2,500-$3,000.

incentives.program: Rhode Island Commerce Corp. Small-Scale Solar Program
incentives.short_description: 10-25% back on installation costs up to $5,000. Includes electricity-generating solar panels and solar domestic hot water technologies.

incentives.program: Rhode Island Energy Electric Heating and Cooling Rebates
incentives.short_description: $350+ back on qualifying ducted central heat pump, depending on size. Additional funding available for replacing baseboard resistance heating.

incentives.program: Rhode Island Energy Electric Heating and Cooling Rebates
incentives.short_description: $150+ back on qualifying mini-split non-ducted heat pump, depending on size. Additional funding available for replacing baseboard resistance heating.

incentives.program: Rhode Island Home Electrification and Appliance Rebate Program
incentives.short_description: Up to $4,000 rebate for electrical load service center. Available for low-income residents.

incentives.program: Rhode Island Home Electrification and Appliance Rebate Program
incentives.short_description: Up to $2,500 rebate for electric wiring. Available for low-income residents.

incentives.program: Rhode Island Home Electrification and Appliance Rebate Program
incentives.short_description: Up to $1,840 rebate for ENERGY STAR certified heat pump clothes dryer, electric stove, induction cooktop, range, or oven for low-income residents.

incentives.program: RI Office of Energy Resources DRIVE EV
incentives.short_description: Up to $1,500 back after purchase or lease of a new EV from a licensed Rhode Island or qualified out-of-state dealership. First-come, first-served.

incentives.program: RI Office of Energy Resources DRIVE+
incentives.short_description: Additional $1,500 back after purchase or lease of a new EV from a licensed Rhode Island or qualified out-of-state dealership for LIHEAP-qualifiers.

incentives.program: RI Office of Energy Resources DRIVE+
incentives.short_description: Additional $1,500 towards a used EV from a licensed Rhode Island or qualified out-of-state dealership for LIHEAP-qualifiers. First-come, first-served.

incentives.program: RI Office of Energy Resources DRIVE EV
incentives.short_description: Up to $1,000 back after purchase or lease of a used EV from a licensed Rhode Island or qualified out-of-state dealership. First-come, first-served.

incentives.program: Rhode Island Energy Water Heating Rebates
incentives.short_description: Up to $600 back on a qualifying electric heat pump water heater when replacing an existing electric water heater or installing in a new home.

incentives.program: Rhode Island Energy Electric Heating and Cooling Rebates
incentives.short_description: $75 back on ENERGY STAR certified, wireless connection enabled Smart Thermostat.

incentives.program: Rhode Island Energy Appliance and Electronics Incentives
incentives.short_description: $50 back on ENERGY STAR® certified electric clothes dryer purchased in 2023. Rebate requests must be completed within 90 days of purchase.
